channel.title: Character Creation

item.title: Character Creation
item.dc:creator: @The_Unholy The Unholy
item.description:
@The_Unholy wrote:

I would like it so that the character design interface is loaded upon login, when itâ€™s closed a chat interface is loaded. How would I do that? This is my code at the moment:
PlayerCharacter.saveEvent(c, 40 + Misc.random(120)); c.getPacketSender().sendMessage("Welcome to " + Constants.SERVER_NAME + ""); if(c.tutorial == 0){ c.getPacketSender().sendInterface(3559); c.getPacketSender().gettingStarted(); }

Read full topic
